Operating System (OS) Boards  

 

  

 

 

 

Unknown OS Board #3 - Front

Unknown OS Board #3 - Back

This is yet another unknown OS board.  Currently is does not boot up.  Getting a green screen when powered up with it installed.   2 Sockets are empty, it is possible they are for Static RAM or perhaps Atari OS ROMs but without schematics or details on the board it is difficult to guess what chips may need to be placed into those sockets or if anything even needs to go into them.

The 2 ROM's have the word EEMod01 and Expan1 on them.   There are no other markings or date codes on the PC Board so there is no way to tell who made the board and when it was made.

On the Rear of the board is a switch block with 2 switches.  Hopefully someone will recognize this board and knows what its purpose is and will contact the Atari Musuem:  CLICK HERE
